title: League Screensaver not working. Black screen
body: This has been happening since the last update and it still hasn't been fixed. I've tried everything so it can't be just me.

replies.body: Where do you have the League Screensaver application installed? Is it in the same parent folder as League itself (default is C:\Riot Games) or is it somewhere else?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qnn5EE63,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T02:55:12.979+0000)
>
> Where do you have the League Screensaver application installed? Is it in the same parent folder as League itself (default is C:\Riot Games) or is it somewhere else?

I tried deleting and reinstalling into a different place and it still doesn't work

Unfortunately, if a clean uninstall and reinstall didn't resolve any issues you were having with the application, there isn't much else that can be done to troubleshoot it. I recommend reporting this on our [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) so we can keep an eye on the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qnn5EE63,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T02:55:12.979+0000)
>
> Where do you have the League Screensaver application installed? Is it in the same parent folder as League itself (default is C:\Riot Games) or is it somewhere else?

Yeah, its in the same folder. Should I move it?
